translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on the Conditions in Reverse Order

original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)🔽21.43. Rūpīduka, Sanidassanattika🔽Narūpiṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca rūpī sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Narūpiṁ naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca rūpī anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi  rūpi iduka sani dassana ttika  na rūpim na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca rūpī sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi  na rūpim na anidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca rūpī anidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ
translated: The Chapter on the Conditions in Brief🔽With-materiality, with-immateriality, with-normal-matter, with-non-normal-matter, with-object, with-non-object, with- impinging, with-non-impinging

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe🔽ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Naarūpiṁ naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca rūpī anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe aññamaññe 🔽ekam pe a vigate tīṇi 🔽na arūpim na anidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca rūpī anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā eka adhipatiyā ekam pe avigate eka
